QuestData.Title: Return to Valgarde
QuestData.Description: 'Tis a shame we lost two of our best dwarves while uncovering these relics. They sacrificed their lives to keep this information safe.$B$B<Glorenfeld wraps the cipher and tablets in a tattered cloth.>$B$BTake these back to Valgarde. McSorf will know what to do with the find.$B$BAs for me? I'll be alright on my own. I've gotten this far in one piece!
QuestData.LogDescription: Take Glorenfeld's Package to Beltrand McSorf at Valgarde Port.
QuestData.RewardText: Sorting these tablets out is going to take some time. All I can gather from a precursory study is that whatever used to be here was an ancestor of the humans. Those vrykul things probably killed 'em all off. Anyhow, we'll know more once I get these relics set up.
